item.description:
I'm starting a monthly "Girl's Night"! So what are we going to do this this Girl's Night?! Whatever we decide! I'm hoping we'll have a theme for every month, and rotate to each others houses or to different locales. It'll be a great way to get out, make new friends, and have something to look forward to each month. At the meeting, we will choose the date for the next Girl's Night, the location, the host, and the theme!

This Month's Girl's Night:

1. Date: Saturday, June 11th at 5pm

2. Location: Susan's House in Portland

*Address will be emailed out to those attending 1 week in advance.

3. Host: Susan

4. Theme: Hawaiian Luau

 

Please dress in your best Hawaiian outfit! (I already have mine picked out!) Also, please sign up to bring one of the following by adding a comment at the bottom of the page when you RSVP:

1. Hawaiian Purple Sweet Potatoes

http://gohawaii.about.com/od/luaurecipes/r/hawaiian-purple-sweet-potato-recipe.htm

2. Pipi Kaula (Easy to make, but takes time, so start a day early)

http://gohawaii.about.com/od/luaurecipes/r/pipi-kaula-recipe.htm

3. Hawaiian Poi 

http://gohawaii.about.com/od/luaurecipes/r/hawaiian-poi-recipe.htm

4. Huli Huli Chicken (We can grill this at the luau, you just need prepare and bring it)

http://gohawaii.about.com/od/luaurecipes/r/huli-huli-chicken-recipe.htm

5. Lomilomi Salmon

http://gohawaii.about.com/od/luaurecipes/r/lomilomi-salmon.htm

6. Beef Teriyaki 

http://gohawaii.about.com/od/luaurecipes/r/teriyaki-beef-or-chicken-recipe.htm

7. Char Sui

http://gohawaii.about.com/od/luaurecipes/r/char_sui.htm

8. Chocolate Mochi

http://gohawaii.about.com/od/luaurecipes/r/chocolate-mochi-recipe.htm

9. Butter Mochi

http://gohawaii.about.com/od/luaurecipes/r/butter-mochi-recipe.htm

10. Sauteed Mahi Mahi

http://gohawaii.about.com/od/seafoodrecipes/r/mahi_mahi_b.htm

11. Banana Bread

http://gohawaii.about.com/od/luaurecipes/r/banana_bread.htm

12. Chicken Abodo

http://gohawaii.about.com/od/luaurecipes/r/chicken_adobo.htm

13. Taro Rolls

http://gohawaii.about.com/od/luaurecipes/r/taro_rolls.htm

14. Blue Hawaiian (drinks)

http://www.hawaiianluauparty.com/luauparty/tiki-bar-drinks.cfm

15. Easy Hawaiian Punch (non-alcoholic)

http://www.hawaiianluauparty.com/luauparty/tiki-bar-drinks.cfm

16. Burgers

17. Hot Dogs

18. Hot Dog & Hamburger Rolls

19. Paper Plates & Silverware

20. Napkins & Condiments

21. Something Hawaiian - your choice

22. Something Hawaiian - your choice

23. Something Hawaiian - your choice

24. Hawaiian Decorations

25. Hawaiian Decorations

You do not need to spend a lot on these items. Our goal is to spend less than $20 for each. I hope to see you there!
item.name: Girls Night! Theme: Hawaiian Luau
